about_the_game:
Painted In Blood is currently in development.

A Love Letter To All My Beloved FPS Games

With 30 years single-player FPS gaming history, I created this game with my whole life's passion, I want to use this game to express my love to the FPS genre, let you adventure through a strange world full of dangers, imagination and excitement; kill eerie monsters from your weirdest dreams with badass weapons. Finally, to realize my creative vision as an artist to the interactive medium.

Game Features

Immersive Single-Player Campaign:

Experience a linear and focused single-player campaign with intense combat actions, eschewed open-world mechanics and sprawling skill trees in favor of a tightly-paced journey rich in atmosphere and excitement.

Vivid And Atmospheric Environment:

Painted In Blood utilizes a dark and gritty aesthetic to create a deeply immersive world. Environments not only boast distinct tones and settings but also employ visual storytelling techniques to enhance player experience.

Dynamic Psychological Horror:

Inspired by the creator's childhood curiosity of the unknown, Painted In Blood features a dynamic sanity system that alters gameplay and visuals based on your actions. Brace yourself for unexpected horror events triggered by your performance and mental state.

Unrelenting Combat:

Encounter a bestiary of unique enemy designs, each with distinct behaviors. Master the art of combat as you adapt to the challenges posed by mixing different enemy types.

High-Fidelity Pixel Art:

Powered by Unreal Engine 5, Painted In Blood pushes the boundaries of pixel rendering. Imagine a world where technology embraced 2D sprites, resulting in a visual style that blends classic aesthetics with cutting-edge technology of today.

content_descriptors.notes: The game contains extreme violence and gore, horrifying imagery, use of alcohol or other drugs.  The content might not be appropriate for all audiences, the viewer's discretion is adviced.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel Core i5, AMD Ryzen 3 or equivalent (64 bit)
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 970 or higher
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 10 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel Core i7, AMD Ryzen 7 or equivalent (64 bit)
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 1080 or higher
  • DirectX: Version 12
  • Storage: 10 GB available space

short_description: Trapped in the haunting realm of an artist's twisted nightmare, engage in intense combat with grotesque enemies and monsters, experience unpredictable horror events that unfold dynamically, seamlessly blends classic retro FPS elements with modern elements.
